trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Hobart
There were no other sightings in Hobart on or around March 22nd 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was standing outside looking towards the east, where just above the tree line i was watching 3 hawks flying around in circles. i looked maybe a foot to the left and something spherical or orb looking object caught my eye. it was just different i cannot explain. i focused on it as closely as i could, but it was silent and moving very quickly. when the object was to my north it faded into a tree line and i could not scope it back out.. at this time i looked back east and saw a commercial airline heading in similar direction so i compared the height and speed. the object had to be at least a 1-2 miles high, and moving in the area of 400-600mph, possible a little more. it had no characteristics of the airplane. it was just a orb\spherical object moving se to nw, silent, and fast. it was a dull grey\white metallic color. not shiny, but it slightly reflected the sun, in a very dull way. i am trying not to jump to any conclusion, but i am an avid sky watcher and it just seemed to be quite different from anything i've seen in the sky. it was not another airplane very high in the sky. i have lived here my whole life and watched airplanes coming into the chicago area, and this was not a plane!
Summary: Spherical object seen traveling 400-600mph w/ airplanes and birds in background for comparison
